system.effect:
Effect: Until the end of the scene, you and your Pokémon can speak to each other fluently, as if you shared a language. Others cannot understand this language; to them, it sounds like a meaningless series of sounds unless they have other ways of understanding you or your Pokémon.

Bonus: You gain a +1d6 to Guile, Charm, and Intimidate checks against Pokémon who have a member of their evolutionary family in your Pokedex. If you have the Mystic senses trait, you gain a 1d6 bonus to using it replace a Guile, Charm, or Intimidate check against those Pokémon.

Note: If your game doesn't use or heavily feature Pokédex’s, any Pokémon that the trainer has seen before qualifies
prerequisites: Expert Pokémon Education or Expert Intuition

ptu.prereqBackup: Mystic, Expert Pokémon Education or Expert Intuition
